languages.text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} больше или равно 10, персонаж наносит на {uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}. ! Может использоваться только несанкционированным псайкером.
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: Спровоцировав появление пси-морока или угроз варпа, персонаж немедленно получает <u>(ВОЛ + бонус ИНТ)</u> временного здоровья. Также персонаж получает иммунитет к первому проявлению пси-морока или угроз варпа за бой.

Спровоцировав появление пси-морока или угроз варпа, персонаж немедленно получает <u>(ВОЛ + бонус ИНТ)</u> временного здоровья. Также персонаж получает иммунитет к первому проявлению пси-морока или угроз варпа за бой.

Если {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} больше или равно 10, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} дополнительно. ! Может использоваться только несанкционированным псайкером.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度不低于10点时，装备者所有的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能力量{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}%。 ！此装备只能由非法灵能者装备。
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: 当障壁恶化程度不低于10点时，装备者所有的灵能力量造成的伤害提高（意志加值+感知加值）%。 ！此装备只能由非法灵能者装备。

当{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度不低于10点时，装备者所有的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能力量{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}%。 ！此装备只能由非法灵能者装备。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が10以上の場合、使用者は全ての{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}で+{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 ！非公認の異能者のみ装備可能。
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: ヴェールの劣化が10以上の間、着用者は全部の超能力を使って＋（WPボーナス＋PERボーナス）％の追加ダメージを与える。 ！非公認の異能者しか装着できない。

{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が10以上の間、使用者は全ての{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}で+{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 ！非公認の異能者のみ装備可能。

languages.text: Mientras la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} sea igual o superior a 10, el portador inflige +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}. ! Solo puede equiparlo un psíquico no autorizado.
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: Tras desatar poderes psíquicos o fatalidades de la disformidad, el portador gana <u>(bonificación por VOL + INT)</u> heridas temporales de inmediato. Además, el portador se vuelve inmune a la primera activación de fenómenos psíquicos o fatalidades de la disformidad de cada combate.

Mientras la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} sea igual o superior a 10, el portador inflige +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}. ! Solo puede equiparlo un psíquico no autorizado.

languages.text: Wenn {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} größer oder gleich 10 ist, verursacht der Träger mit allen {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}zusätzlichen Schaden{/g}. Kann nur von einem unsanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden!
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Zerfall des Schleiers größer oder gleich 10 ist, verursacht der Träger mit allen psionischen Kräften +(WK-Bonus + WAH-Bonus) % Zusatzschaden. Kann nur von einem unsanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden!

Wenn {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} größer oder gleich 10 ist, verursacht der Träger mit allen {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g}. Kann nur von einem unsanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden!

languages.text: Tant que la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} est supérieure ou égale à 10, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker non assermenté.
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: Tant que la dégradation du voile est supérieure ou égale à 10, tous les pouvoirs psychiques de l'utilisateur infligent +(bonus de VOL + bonus de PER) % de dégâts supplémentaires. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker non assermenté.

Tant que la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du Voile{/g} est supérieure ou égale à 10, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker non assermenté.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulması{/g} 10 veya daha fazla olduğunda tüm {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleriyle{/g} +%{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. ! Yalnızca onaysız ruhsezerlerce kuşanılabilir.
languages.original_text: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. !
